heading: Mailing to billing address
text:
To the person designated as owner of the building or designated to receive real property
   tax or water bills for the building at the address for such person contained in one of the files compiled by the department of
   finance for the purpose of the assessment or collection of real property taxes and water charges or in the file compiled by the
   department of finance from real property transfer forms filed with the city register upon the sale or transfer of real property; or
